refnamediv.refpurpose: Name of the stylesheet(s) to use in the generated HTML

refsection.para: The html.stylesheet parameter is either empty, indicating that no stylesheet link tag should be generated in the html output, or it is a list of one or more stylesheet files.

Multiple stylesheets are space-delimited. If you need to reference a stylesheet URI that includes a space, encode it with %20. A separate html link element will be generated for each stylesheet in the order they are listed in the parameter.
